text: Gustavo Denegri (born March 1937) is an Italian billionaire businessman, the chairman of DiaSorin, an Italian biotechnology company. He has a bachelor's degree in chemistry from the University of Turin. Denegri owns 44% of DiaSorin via IP Investimenti e Partecipazioni, a holding company controlled by his family. By 2020, Forbes estimated his net worth at $3.1 billion. He is married with two children, and lives in Turin, Italy. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Italian billionaires Category:Italian businesspeople Category:Living people Category:People from Turin Category:University of Turin alumni
